pageProduct.name: Olay Regenerist Niacinamide Sheet Mask
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream, for firmer, plumper skin.

Olay Regenerist Niacinamide Sheet Mask Instantly Reduces The Look Of Fine Lines & Wrinkles. Firmer, Plumper & Younger-Looking Skin From First Use.

Olay Regenerist Microsculpting Niacinamide Sheet Mask is specifically designed with a special elastic substrate to ensure optimal fit in a ultra-soft sheet for a relaxing and refreshing experience. It contains 1/3 the actives in a jar of Olay Regenerist Micro-sculpting Cream. It is formulated with 99% Pure Grade Niacinamide or Vitamin B3,?the ultimate skin care ingredient, scientifically proven?to improve texture, reduce fine lines and wrinkles and reduce the appearance of dark spots.

Size: 1 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• FORMULA/TECHNOLOGY:
• RICH ACTIVES: 1 SHEET CONTAINS 1/3 THE ACTIVES IN A JAR
• TENSION-FIT DESIGN: OPTIMAL FIT WITH SPECIAL ELASTIC SUBSTRATE.
• ULTRA-SOFT SHEET: FOR A RELAXING AND REFRESHING EXPERIENCE.
• FORMULATED WITHOUT: SULPHATES, PARABENS, PHTHALATES, PETROLATUM, MINERAL OILS^
• ^excludes impurities due to manufacturing process.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes.If contact occurs, rinse eyes with water

Ingredients

Water, Butylene Glycol, Niacinamide, Glycerin, Panthenol, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Allantoin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isopropyl Isostearate, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Disodium EDTA, Laureth-7, Fragrance

Directions

Stretch both sides of the mask to fully cover the face and press gently to ensure a good fit. Leave the mask on for 15 minutes then gently remove it.
